CustomField.description: Does your Privacy Policy inform the user how their data (i.e. PHI) will be accessed, exchanged, or used by another entity (including in the future)?
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Does your Privacy Policy inform the user how their data (i.e. PHI) will be accessed, exchanged, or used by another entity (including in the future)?
CustomField.label: Informs user of data access?
